name: Aquatic Dye
flavorText: Sailors from Lut Gholein distill the waters of the Twin Seas and apply the bright blue mixture to their sails in order to blend in and avoid detection by pirates.
flavorTextHtml: Sailors from Lut Gholein distill the waters of the Twin Seas and apply the bright blue mixture to their sails in order to blend in and avoid detection by pirates.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
